It is sad when someone you love does not love you in return. Sometimes you wonder if love needs any return if you have truly loved. Being loved is always something wonderful. So wonderful that people drift into a state of bliss and take it for granted at times. When it disappears, it will just be gone, suddenly, forever… and you will never recover from the lost. This is the time you take whatever of the wonderful memories you had, picture that the person you loved will be smiling happily, the same smile that you have always love, knowing that she will be happy in that state without you… and you let her go. Waiting… patiently… hoping that she will once again remember who you are and come back to your side. Chances are, she will not remember you because it is easier to forget the sad and unhappy moments. With you, it was sad for her… tiring. Like her, someday, you will forget that you have once been hurt. Live on! Remember those happy moments in the memory lane with her. And your heart stays with her till then……

You mind, the Unlimited Power. You have the choice to choose the state you are in. Becoming successful is simply about modeling those who are already successful, depending on what you deem is success in life. Knowing what is in the person’s mind, the self talk and the actions taken is a basis of modeling after him. Cast out the negativity in you by gaining awareness of you own self talk and the image of the goals you want. The images are either associated or disassociated. An associated image is what one which you experience it thru your own eyes as if you are actually there in person. A disassociated image is one which is like watching a movie of yourself. Which is a more intense experience? Initially when I was with Shell, the images of us being together were mostly disassociated. I was there… directing and hoping how things will turn out. I always manage to change my response to her in these images and As we progress in the relationship, I was thinking about marrying her, the images of our wedding were all associated. I was right there and then… proposing to her, seeing her smiles, looking at her as she walks down the isle… picturing the life we would be having. Always wake up with a smile, hoping and praying that time will fly faster, she will get older and we can go thru it soon… so wonderful. When the break-up came, the images were also associated. She was there saying “NO NO NO” cant sleep, racing heart, feeling out of breathe. As time past, the images came to disassociated, that she was with her new boyfriend, watching them doing the things that I wanted to do with her… those images I had before. Always manipulating the images. Hoping that she will be back by my side somehow. By now, should have figure that associated images are more intense. It is more real. Yesterday, I gain the awareness that images can be tune to associated to gain power and strength to reach you goals. Thru series of exercises, I know that I am still in love with Shell… the images about her recently are all associated.
